callback.distance: Distance must be greater than or equal to 1
callback.driver_cost: Driver cost cannot be greater than or equal to price per distance
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to the Inventary system from farsiman
title.name: Name
title.title: Title
title.partner_support.reset_message: Do you want to send a reset to the device
title.partner_support.modal_help_1: Use this button to restart the currently selected device. This may help resolve minor issues or restore its operational state.
title.partner_support.modal_help_2: This button will lock the selected device, temporarily preventing its use. This action is useful in situations where access needs to be restricted for security or control reasons.
title.partner_support.modal_popConfirm_1: Are you sure you want to send a reset?
title.partner_support.modal_popConfirm_2: Are you sure you want to send a lock?
title.validation_card_max_range: Max amount to generate the validation charge
title.validation_card_min_range: Min amount to generate the validation charge
title.status_allowed_for_extra_payment: Order statuses allowed for extra payments
title.limit_attemps_failed_payment_per_i: Failed payment attempts limit per time window (days)
title.limit_attemps_failed_payment_per_d: Failed payment attempts limit per day
title.validation_card_max_range_help: Maximum amount used to generate the card validation charge.
title.validation_card_min_range_help: Minimum amount used to generate the card validation charge.
title.validation_card_max_attempts_help: Maximum number of failed attempts allowed when validating the card. If exceeded, the card will be blocked and cannot be used for payments.
title.validation_card_request_cooldown_h: Waiting time before a new code can be requested (e.g., 20h, 30m).
title.validation_card_pending_void_timeo: Minimum elapsed time to void pending holds (e.g., 1s, 20h, 1d).
title.validation_card_required_brands_he: Card brands that require validation (VISA, MASTERCARD, AMEX…).
title.validation_card_allow_capture_help: Allow capture when processing payments; if disabled, the charge is automatically reversed for all banks.
title.status_allowed_for_extra_payment_h: Order statuses in which additional payments are allowed (e.g., address or product changes).
title.limit_orders_by_day_help: Maximum number of orders per user per day.
title.limit_attemps_failed_payment_per_i: Maximum failed attempts within a time window.
title.limit_payment_for_first_order_help: Maximum allowed amount for a customer’s first order.
title.interval_saved_card_duration_days_: Window duration used to count saved cards.
title.interval_attemps_failed_payment_du: Window duration used to count failed attempts.
title.max_cards_per_interval_help: Maximum number of cards saved within the window.
title.max_cards_per_client_help: Maximum number of saved cards per customer.
title.unverified_default_limit_help: Default limit for unverified users. (Used only if territory limits are not configured.)
title.layer_save_card_enabled_help: Enable rules related to saved cards (max saved cards per customer, max new cards within window, etc.).
title.layer_failed_attempts_enabled_help: Enable rules based on failed attempts (daily and window limits).
title.layer_unvalidated_user_enabled_hel: Enable rules for unverified users (per-order amount limit, etc.).
title.layer_ip_restriction_enabled_help: Enable IP restriction rules (order attempts or card saves from blocked IPs, etc.).
help.cai_alerts_intro: Set up alerts to notify you when CAI records are running low.
help.cash_limit.define_per_service: Define specific cash limits for each service.
classification.instruction_1: 1. To move a classification from the classification structure, look for your classification in selected classifications and click on the box.
classification.instruction_2: 2. If you want to change the order of the classification displayed in the app, you just need to move the classifications in the classification structure and save the changes.
classification.parent_instruction_1: Click 'Create parent classification', assign it a name, and save.
classification.parent_instruction_2: To add sub-classifications, click the + sign and assign a name.
classification.parent_instruction_3: You cannot delete a classification that has nested sub-classifications. Please delete the sub-classifications first.
classification.delete.popConfirm: Are you sure to delete this node?
title.label: Tag
title: Title
title.rule_card_coupon_3: The use of emojis is not allowed, for example
title.rule_card_coupon_4: The coupon code should be simple examples.
title.coupon_tooltip_des: refers to the amount of the subtotal that the order must reach in order for the customer to receive the benefit associated with the coupon.
title.coupon_tooltip_minimun_scenario_1: Scenario 1: Order with a subtotal of 100 Lps → Result: The coupon does not apply.
title.coupon_tooltip_minimun_scenario_2: Scenario 2: Order with a subtotal of 500 Lps → Result: Apply the coupon.
title.coupon_tooltip_maximun_scenario_1: Scenario 1: Order with a subtotal of 100 Lps → Result: Apply the coupon.
title.coupon_tooltip_maximun_scenario_2: Scenario 2: Order with a subtotal of 500 Lps → Result: The coupon does not apply.

title.renter_description: This business operates under a franchise model with a limited number of branches.

title.availability_action: Changing the availability status will cause this store not to appear in the app.
title.reference_times_not_ascending: Reference times are not in ascending order

messageRequired.name: Name is required
messageRequired.percentual: A percentage value greater than 100 is not allowed
messageRequired.title: Title is required
messageRequired.No_order: The order number cannot be empty
messageRequired.minimum_amount: Minimum amount by order is required
messageRequired.minStockLessThanStock: The minimum stock must be less than the stock
messageRequired.restaurant_id: The field must only contain alphanumeric characters (no spaces or special characters)
messageRequired.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
messageRequired.password_uppercase: The password must include at least one uppercase letter
messageRequired.password_lowercase: The password must include at least one lowercase letter
messageRequired.password_number: The password must include at least one number
messageRequired.password_special: The password must include at least one special character (@, $, !, %, *, ?, &)
messageRequired.password_max_length: The password cannot be longer than 16 characters
messageRequired.final_value_greater_than: The final value must be greater than the initial value.
messageRequired.initial_value_less_than_: The initial value must be less than the final value.
messageRequired.limit_by_user: Usage limit per customer is required.
messageRequired.sponsor_percentage_range: Please enter a valid percentage for Compi (between 0 and 100).
messageRequired.paid_compi: Please enter a valid value for Compi.
messageRequired.amountExceeds: The amount of the charge/discount cannot exceed the total of the order.
messageRequired.amountExceedsDiscount: The amount of the charge/discount cannot exceed the total discount granted.
messageRequired.limit_per_day: The limit per day is required
messageValidation.start_date_before_end_: The start date cannot be longer than the expiration date.
messageValidation.end_date_after_start_d: The expiration date cannot be less than the start date.
messageSelect.initial_time: An initial time must be selected
messageSelect.final_time: An end time must be selected
messageSelect.payments: A payment method must be selected
